item.title: Alumni
item.description: Graduate Students (MPhil & PhD) and Postdoctoral Researchers (Postdoc) Zhao, Wei MPhil, 2006-2008 (currently an analyst at GF Securities Co. Ltd.) Liang, Zhixiong PhD, 2007-2011 (currently a manager at the Research and Development Department, Hawley & Hazel Chemical Company) Tang, Qin PhD, 2007-2011 (currently a senior research scientist at Rohm and Haas, Dow Chemical Company) Zheng, Xing MPhil, 2008-2010 (currently at Fujian Huamin Industrial Group Co. Ltd.) Li, Zhefeng Postdoc, 2009-2010 (currently an associate professor at School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, Chongqing University)
